item.title: Analytics
item.description: INTRODUCTION At the time of writing this walkthrough, Analytics is still active. The box centers around a fictional analytics company that provides data analysis services using the infrastructure they’re hosting. The company is running a popular open-source analytics / BI platform. This box uses a modern architecture, reflective of how real websites run these days (when they’re on-prem). For each step of Analytics, the skill emphasis is placed firmly on enumeration.
